crypto_ca_record ccr JOIN crypto_coin c ON c.coin_id = ccr.ca_id ORDER BY ccr.query_count DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT coin_address AS address, coin_name AS symbol, COUNT(*) AS query_count FROM crypto_wallet_transactions WHERE operation_type = '买入' AND del_flag = 0 AND DATE(transaction_time) = CURDATE() GROUP BY coin_address, coin_name ORDER BY query_count DESC LIMIT 4;

SELECT c.coin_id, r.max_multiple, c.address, c.symbol FROM crypto_ca_record r JOIN ( SELECT ca_id, MAX( max_multiple ) AS max_multiple FROM crypto_ca_record WHERE del_flag = '0' GROUP BY ca_id ) m ON r.ca_id = m.ca_id AND r.max_multiple = m.max_multiple JOIN crypto_coin c ON r.ca_id = c.coin_id WHERE r.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY r.max_multiple DESC;

SELECT c.*, r.query_count, r.max_multiple, r.first_query_user_id, r.first_query_group_id, r.first_query_time, r.first_market_cap, r.first_price, r.highest_market_cap, r.highest_price, r.highest_time FROM crypto_coin c LEFT JOIN crypto_ca_record r ON c.coin_id = r.ca_id
c.del_flag = '0'
